Title: Object: Tentation de St. Antoine
Series: Galerie Impériale de l'Ermitage
Description: The Temptation of St Antony; interior of a cave with the saint praying in front of a crucifix placed on a skull, two temptresses standing behind him, a monkey-like creature playing a flute at right, other demonic and grotesque creatures at left; after David Teniers the Younger. c.1845-1847 Lithograph on chine collé
Producer name: Print made by: François Joseph Dupressoir
Curator's comments: See 1859,1008.128 for comment on series. After the painting by Teniers in the Hermitage, St Petersburg.
Bibliographic references: IFF / Inventaire du Fonds Français: Bibliothèque Nationale, Département des Estampes (undescribed) (Dupressoir)
Associated names: Representation of: St Antony of Egypt
